page.title: 17 The Population of Amble
page.content: The balance of the{population}has changed in the last 30 years and although there are still approximately 20 people of the total population of 98 who were{born and bred}in the village,the majority are immigrants. Most of the working population{travel considerable distances from their village to their workplace.17 of them are{retired people}who live in the village all year round.There is no doctor's or dentist's surgery in the village.The nearest surgery is in {Wadebridge}the market town 3 miles away.Every Monday the one{bus service through the village,from Port Isaac to Wadebridge, goes through Amble at 10.00 am and returns at 1.00 pm.
